testcase.name: Check that item details shows the right values
testcase.system-out: Given The user open the login page..........................................passed When The user enter a valid username "s.mahallel99@gmail.com"...............passed And The user enter a valid password "123456789a"............................passed And The user check the remeber me check box.................................passed Then The system should redirect to the dashboard page with the title "ACME System 1 - Dashboard".passed Given The user open the Work Items..........................................passed And Choose a random item and save the data of random item...................passed When Click symbol search....................................................passed Then Work Item details appear...............................................passed And The url contain the the WIID of the seleced random item.................passed And Under Work Item Details section shows the right data (WIID_Type_Status_Date) of selected random item.passed When User click on button Update Work Item..................................passed Then A new windows pop Up...................................................passed Given The User change the status of the item to rejected....................passed When The user click on Update Work Item.....................................passed Then Then an alert with following appears "Please fill in the complete update form!".passed Given The user add comment and click again on Update Work Item..............passed Then Then an alert with following appears "Work Item was updated accordingly".passed Given The user navigate back to work item table and check the status of random selected item.passed Then The item status is changed to "Rejected"...............................passed
